metadata.synopsis: In this animated adventure, chipmunk Alvin (Ross Bagdasarian Jr.) has werewolves on his mind. After being haunted by a creepy nightmare, he is convinced that his eerie next-door neighbor, Mr. Talbot (Maurice LaMarche), has a monstrous secret. As he and his brother Simon (also Bagdasarian) investigate, shy sibling Theodore (Janice Karman), who has been reluctantly cast in the school's production of "Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde," finds his inner monster after being attacked by a strange dog.
metadata.genre: Animation/Comedy/Horror/Kids & Family/Musical & Performing Arts/Science Fiction & Fantasy

reviews: Obviously, there's nothing to frighten today's sophisticated toddlers in the story of the chipmunk who becomes convinced that his neighbour is a werewolf.
A loveable horror story with life lessons.
